title: aLLi aLippAn
sahitya:
aLLi aLippAn aruLai aDiyAr iDar tIravE vaLLi maNALan koDai vaLLal vaDivElan


anupallavi

  kaLLamillAk-kAdal uLLavarkkellAm uLLak-kaLippODavar uyyak-krpai sheidu


caraNam    arahara muuganE tirumAl maruganE arumukhattaiyanE aruT-koDaik-kaiyanE
sharavaNa bhavanE shrI gurupara guhanE enru sharaNam pughundadum karuNai mighundi avan
